## halton23() function

Generates an array of jitters using the Halton sequence.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function halton23(length: number): [number, number][];
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

length


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The length of the array to generate.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

\[number, number\]\[\]

An array of jitters, range \[-0.5, 0.5\].
